metadata.title: CVE-2020-35523 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An integer overflow flaw was found in libtiff that exists in the tif_getimage.c file. This flaw allows an attacker to inject and execute arbitrary code when a user opens a crafted TIFF file. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to confidentiality, integrity, as well as system availability.

criterions.comment: tiff package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.1.0+git201212-1ubuntu1').
